name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-ace-group-viewer
title: Group Viewer
shortDescription: Loads group and group members of the current. Clicking the card or quick view will display a list of members and with actions to email that member.
longDescription: This adaptive card extension sample will load the group and group members of the current site it is on. Clicking the card or quick view will display a list of members and with actions to email that member.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
